channel.title: Wheres a good place to download movies in .avi format
channel.description: Well, I've tried torrenting and I've only got files in .bin. Also, if you could tell he how convert from .bin to .avi or .mpg, that would be pretty cool.

item.title: Wheres a good place to download movies in .avi format
item.dc:creator: @goatee goatee
item.description:
@goatee wrote:

[quote=“jme_009, post:3, topic:28816”]I find that 99% of time torrents come as avi files. Just go to thepiratebay.org, or whatever.

I doubt there are any ftp sites for downloading movies so…[/quote]

Actually there are, i found it while i was lookni for serial for kaspersky. They upload movies onto rapidshare and megaupload… sumtimes sexuploader if you get my drift.

Unfortunately i cant find it again. But i downloaded championship manager for PC and borat the movie off it.
